TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompilerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示语言提供程序的配置设置。

span.span: Represents the configuration settings of a language provider.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类以确定是否实现配置的计算机上，或检查为特定语言提供程序的配置和编译器设置。Use the class to determine whether a implementation is configured on the computer, or to examine the configuration and compiler settings for a specific language provider. [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)计算机配置文件包含的语言提供程序和编译器配置设置。The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings. 每个已配置的语言提供程序具有相应的编译器配置元素。Each configured language provider has a corresponding compiler configuration element. 每个元素定义实现类型、 受支持的语言名称、 受支持的文件名称扩展和编译器参数。Each element defines the implementation type, supported language names, supported file name extensions, and compiler parameters. .NET Framework 在计算机配置文件中定义的初始编译器设置。The .NET Framework defines the initial compiler settings in the machine configuration file. 开发人员和编译器供应商可以添加新 实现的配置设置。Developers and compiler vendors can add configuration settings for a new implementation. 类提供对计算机配置文件中的这些设置的只读访问。The class provides read-only access to these settings in the machine configuration file. 使用， ，和语言提供程序检查相应的配置属性的成员。Use the , , and members to examine the corresponding configuration attributes for a language provider. 使用方法来为语言提供程序获取编译器选项和警告级别的属性值。Use the method to obtain the compiler options and warning level attribute values for a language provider. 有关配置文件中的语言提供程序设置的更多详细信息，请参阅[编译器和语言提供程序设置架构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c020b139-8699-4f0d-9ac9-70d0c5b2a8c8)。For more details on language provider settings in the configuration file, see [Compiler and Language Provider Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c020b139-8699-4f0d-9ac9-70d0c5b2a8c8). > [!NOTE] > 此类包含在类级别应用于所有成员的链接要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 有关链接要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about link demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示语言提供程序配置设置。The following code example displays language provider configuration settings. 命令行自变量用于指定语言、 文件扩展名或提供程序类型。Command-line arguments are used to specify a language, file name extension, or provider type. 对于给定的输入，示例确定相应的语言提供程序，并显示配置的语言编译器设置。For the given input, the example determines the corresponding language provider and displays the configured language compiler settings. [!code-cpp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CodeDomProviderType As Type
public: property Type ^ CodeDomProviderType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取已配置的 实现的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the configured implementation.

value.span: 一个只读 实例，它表示已配置的语言提供程序类型。

span.span: A read-only instance that represents the configured language provider type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算机配置文件包含每个的完全限定的类型名称计算机上的实现。The machine configuration file contains the fully qualified type name for each implementation on the computer. 属性值是表示已配置的语言提供程序实现的实例。The property value is a instance that represents a configured language provider implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否具有一个已配置的输入的语言计算机上的实现。The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured implementation on the computer. 如果没有为指定的语言配置提供程序，此示例将显示的语言提供程序配置设置。If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/VB/source.vb#7)]

exception.span: 此计算机上没有配置语言提供程序。

span.span: The language provider is not configured on this computer.

exception.span: 不能定位类型，因为它是 或空字符串。

span.span: Cannot locate the type because it is a or empty string.
-or-

exception.span: 不能定位类型，因为不能在配置文件中找到 的名称。

span.span: Cannot locate the type because the name for the cannot be found in the configuration file.
for calling members of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters CreateDefaultCompilerParameters() cil managed

summary.span: 获取语言提供程序实现的配置的编译器设置。

span.span: Gets the configured compiler settings for the language provider implementation.

returns.span: 一个只读 实例，它包含为语言提供程序配置的编译器选项和设置。

span.span: A read-only instance that contains the compiler options and settings configured for the language provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可检查的编译器设置实例返回和方法。Use the method to examine the compiler settings of the instances returned by the and methods. [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)计算机配置文件包含每个语言提供程序和编译器配置设置计算机上的实现。The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each implementation on the computer. 每个语言提供程序配置元素可以包含可选`compilerOptions`和`warningLevel`属性。Each language provider configuration element can contain optional `compilerOptions` and `warningLevel` attributes. 这些特性定义的默认值和属性。These attributes define the default values for the and properties. 如果语言提供程序配置元素不会定义`compilerOptions`属性，属性值为空字符串 ("")。If the language provider configuration element does not define the `compilerOptions` attribute, the property value is an empty string (""). 如果语言提供程序配置元素不会定义`warningLevel`属性，属性值为 1。If the language provider configuration element does not define the `warningLevel` attribute, the property value is –1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否具有一个已配置的输入的语言计算机上的实现。The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured implementation on the computer. 如果没有为指定的语言配置提供程序，此示例将显示的语言提供程序配置设置。If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CodeDom_CompilerInfo#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDom_CompilerInfo/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 返回当前语言提供程序设置的 实例。

span.span: Returns a instance for the current language provider settings.

returns.span: 与语言提供程序配置关联的 CodeDOM 提供程序。

span.span: A CodeDOM provider associated with the language provider configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回当前语言提供程序设置的实例。The method returns a instance for the current language provider settings. 使用方法以获取实现返回实例或方法。Use the method to get a implementation for a instance returned by the or method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举计算机上的语言提供程序，并显示每个语言提供程序的配置和编译器设置。The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回实例有关的当前语言提供程序设置和指定的提供程序选项。The method returns a instance for the current language provider settings and the specified provider options. 有关受支持的提供程序选项的信息，请参阅特定 CodeDOM 提供程序文档。For information about supported provider options, see the specific CodeDOM provider documentation. 使用方法以获取实现返回实例或方法。Use the method to get a implementation for a instance returned by the or method.

summary.span: 返回受语言提供程序支持的文件扩展名。

span.span: Returns the file name extensions supported by the language provider.

returns.span: 受语言提供程序支持的文件扩展名数组。

span.span: An array of file name extensions supported by the language provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)计算机配置文件包含每个语言提供程序和编译器配置设置计算机上的实现。The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each implementation on the computer. 每个已配置的语言提供程序支持一个或多个文件扩展名。Each configured language provider supports one or more file name extensions. 例如，可能支持的文件名称扩展".cs"和".c #"。For example, a might support the file name extensions ".cs" and ".c#". ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举计算机上的语言提供程序，并显示每个语言提供程序的配置和编译器设置。The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 返回当前实例的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns the hash code for the current instance.

returns.span: 当前 实例的 32 位带符号整数哈希代码，适合在哈希算法和数据结构（如哈希表）中使用。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将替代方法。This method overrides the method. 此方法为根据 方法视为相等的两个对象生成相同的哈希代码。This method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类。The following code example creates an instance of the class. 此示例显示提供程序名称、 哈希代码和新的提供程序实例的默认文件扩展名。The example displays the provider name, hash code, and default file name extension for the new provider instance. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取受语言提供程序支持的语言名称。

span.span: Gets the language names supported by the language provider.

returns.span: 受语言提供程序支持的语言名称数组。

span.span: An array of language names supported by the language provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [ <System.codedom>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md)计算机配置文件包含每个语言提供程序和编译器配置设置计算机上的实现。The [<system.codedom> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/compiler/system-codedom-element.md) in the machine configuration file contains the language provider and compiler configuration settings for each implementation on the computer. 每个已配置的语言提供程序支持一个或多个语言名称。Each configured language provider supports one or more language names. 例如，对象可能会返回与语言名称"c#"、"cs"和"csharp"数组。For example, the object for a might return an array with the language names "c#", "cs", and "csharp". ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举计算机上的语言提供程序，并显示每个语言提供程序的配置和编译器设置。The following code example enumerates the language providers on the computer and displays the configuration and compiler settings for each language provider. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否在计算机上配置了语言提供程序实现。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the language provider implementation is configured on the computer.

value.span: 如果在计算机上配置了语言提供程序实现类型，则为 ；否则，为。

span.span: if the language provider implementation type is configured on the computer; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性检查之前访问的提供程序属性或方法的实现。Use the property to check the implementation before accessing the provider properties or methods. 例如，之后你获取语言提供程序设置从方法，请使用属性以验证之前调用的提供程序类型实现方法或使用属性。For example, after you get the language provider settings from the method, use the property to verify the provider type implementation before calling the method or using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否具有一个已配置的输入的语言计算机上的实现。The following code example determines whether the input language has a configured implementation on the computer. 如果没有为指定的语言配置提供程序，此示例将显示的语言提供程序配置设置。If there is a provider configured for the specified language, the example displays the language provider configuration settings. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
